name: Demons (mercantesventura)
description:
I am kind of migrating from RPGmaker to Construct2...  and I will be honest I have a long way to go... So basically While I was trying new things in C2 I thought to myself??

Hey why not release this game for free instead of trashing it?? Maybe people would like it.

So what I am trying to say is that this game was just me working around and improving my skills.

I decided to improve the game and make it larger then what it was like in alpha version....

Enough said about the reasons behind the development. Lets talk about the game!

Demons is a clicker RPG... it plays like Clicker Heroes.... You can buy 6 Items so far I can add more depending on feeedback if people like the game or not...

You also buy some potions at the store...

and basically you keep clicking and defeating the Demons at Stage 1 , 2 ,3, 1000 and that goes on...

I wanted to make and endless game so people can release a lot of dopamine while playing it....

Please leave feedback in case you like the game so I can improve it and make even better games.
